page.title: 08FREISTON FIELD CENTRE
page.content: {Freiston Field Centre}was started in {1972.}Mr. Boult has worked there since then.Before the building was made into a field centre it was a children's hospital.The original building was built in about{1800}Five people work at the Field Centre.The warden Mr. Boult,the deputy warden Mrs Boult,the cook Mrs Powell, the caretaker Mr Robinson and also Mr Robinson takes care of the gardening and the driving. The cleaner is Mrs Chester.They study geography,history,biology and art.The main aim of the {Field Centre }is to use the environment to gather information in order to get a better understanding of it.They can hold{40} children at one time.They stay for{ {2,5}or{6}days.They have{2}laboratories One is an old conservatory.Mr Boult does not live at the{Field Centre.}He lives in{Sibsey.}
